entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow near the American border before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
